EmailTemplate.description: User Announcements for new support flow
EmailTemplate.name: Introducing the New Salesforce Support Form - IMPORTANT
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Introducing the New Salesforce Support Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
As our Salesforce user base continues to grow, we are excited to launch a new Salesforce Support submission process.
All support questions should be directed to Salesforce Support via this form.
This form will allow us to better capture your questions from the get-go which enables us to:
Route your question to the right person/team
Minimize back and forth troubleshooting
Get you a better response faster
Beginning {!Today()+1}, all users who submit requests to salesforcesupport@wework.com will receive an automated message directing them to our new form.
Thanks,
The Salesforce Support Team
